issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://www.deepl.com/translator#ja/en/%E6%B2%88%E9%BB%99%E3%81%AE%E6%98%9F%20%E5%9C%9F%E6%98%9F%E3%82%92%E5%AE%88%E8%AD%B7%E3%81%AB%E6%8C%81%E3%81%A4%20%E7%A0%B4%E6%BB%85%E3%81%A8%E8%AA%95%E7%94%9F%E3%81%AE%E6%88%A6%E5%A3%AB!%20%E3%82%BB%E3%83%BC%E3%83%A9%E3%83%BC%E3%82%B5%E3%82%BF%E3%83%BC%E3%83%B3%EF%BC%81](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.deepl.com%2Ftranslator%23ja%2Fen%2F%25E6%25B2%2588%25E9%25BB%2599%25E3%2581%25AE%25E6%2598%259F%2520%25E5%259C%259F%25E6%2598%259F%25E3%2582%2592%25E5%25AE%2588%25E8%25AD%25B7%25E3%2581%25AB%25E6%258C%2581%25E3%2581%25A4%2520%25E7%25A0%25B4%25E6%25BB%2585%25E3%2581%25A8%25E8%25AA%2595%25E7%2594%259F%25E3%2581%25AE%25E6%2588%25A6%25E5%25A3%25AB!%2520%25E3%2582%25BB%25E3%2583%25BC%25E3%2583%25A9%25E3%2583%25BC%25E3%2582%25B5%25E3%2582%25BF%25E3%2583%25BC%25E3%2583%25B3%25EF%25BC%2581) ### Comment > Even with an account at DeepL, after exhausting some pre-defined amounf of requests per day, there's an annoying pop-up that promts to buy a subscription. Even though it seems to be easily removed by removing some page elements that include this pop-up and the overflow behind it an perhpas changing some properties of some elements. Unfortunately, I got distracted and now my limits are remporarily reinstated, so I can't provide the page code with this popup at this moment. Username: `@COOLak` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/d69lhg9f42gc0co00w0g8wc4ckgkkkoqiiv72f8izk.png?nc=1)

Even though it seems to be easily removed by removing some page elements that include this pop-up and the overflow behind it an perhpas changing some properties of some elements. Unfortunately, I got distracted and now my limits are remporarily reinstated, so I can't provide the page code with this popup at this moment. Username: `@COOLak` ### Screenshots

issue.title: laposte.fr
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

ubo latest

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances  pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.laposte.fr/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

Cannot reproduce with a simple config.
By referring the attached screenshot, please check that Safari content blockers of AdGuard for iOS are enabled.
If so, please reduce subscription about the 3rd-party filters.
